resources.string: SH 12, SHAMLI, Shamli, Uttar Pradesh 247776, India

Govindam Indian Cuisine brings you a variety of dishes from different regions of India. You can enjoy the warmth of Indian hospitality through its cuisine and a variety of beverages. It is not just a place to eat and drink, but to have fun and relax. It is our commitment to use fresh ingredients. We do not use any preservatives or food color.
